result:
*
    transition: 0.6s

.header
    height: 640px
    background-size: contain

.content
    display: flex
    flex-flow: row wrap
    
.content > * 
    padding: 10px
    flex: 1 100%


    
@media all and (min-width: 0px)
    .onlyImageBlock
        // width: 100%
        margin: 10px
        justify-content: center
    .contentBlock-1,.contentBlock-4
        justify-content: center
        display: flex
        flex-flow: row wrap

@media all and (min-width: 640px)
    .contentBlock
        flex: 1 0 0
        justify-content: center
        
    .onlyImageBlock
        width: 585px
        height: 430px
        margin: 10px
        justify-content: flex-end
        background-size: contain
    .contentBlock-1 ,.contentBlock-3,.contentBlock-4
        padding: 0
        margin: 0
        list-style: none
        display: -webkit-box
        display: -moz-box
        display: -ms-flexbox
        display: -webkit-flex
        display: flex
        -webkit-flex-flow: row wrap
        align-content: center
        flex-flow: row wrap

@media all and (min-width: 1280px)
    .contentBlock-1
        order: 1
        justify-content: flex-end
        display: flex
        flex-flow: row wrap
        
    .contentBlock-2
        order: 2
        justify-content: flex-start
    .contentBlock-3
        order: 3
        justify-content: flex-end
    .contentBlock-4
        order: 4
        justify-content: flex-start
    .onlyImageBlock
        width: 580px
        height: 430px
        margin: 10px
        justify-content: flex-end
        background-size: contain

.imageBlock-1, .imageBlock-2 ,.imageBlock-3,.imageBlock-4
    // padding: 15px
    width: 280px
    height: 210px
    margin-top: 10px
    margin: 10px
    line-height: 210px
    color: white
    font-weight: bold
    font-size: 3em
    text-align: center
    background-size: contain

.blockTitle
    position: relative
    padding: 10px
    font-size: 28px
    text-align: left
    font-style: bold
    color: #302D2D
    background-fill-opacity: 0
    z-index: 1
.newsImage
    width: 60px
    height: 60px
    border: 1px #302D2D solid
    
.newsTitle
    font-size: 15px
    padding: 10px
    text-align: left
    color: #6F6F6F
    
.newsList
    padding: 15px
    text-align: left
    display: flex 
    width: 100px

.newsTitle:hover
    cursor: pointer

.newsDer
    position: absolute
    top: 28px
    height: 15px
    width: 120px
    background-color: #FFC53D
    border-radius: 50px
    -webkit-filter: drop-shadow(7px 7px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3))
    filter: drop-shadow(7px 7px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3))
    opacity: 0.5
    z-index: -1

.imageMask
    position: relative
    top: 0px
    left: 0px
    height: 210px
    background-color: #000
    opacity: 0.5
    transition: 0.6s
    
.imageMask:hover
    opacity: 0
    cursor: pointer
.onlyImageMask
    position: relative
    top: 0px
    left: 0px
    height: 430px
    background-color: #000
    opacity: 0.5
    transition: 0.6s
    
.onlyImageMask:hover
    opacity: 0
    cursor: pointer

sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
#app
    SlideShow(:jump-bar="jumpBar")
    div.content
        div.contentBlock-1.contentBlock
            div
                div.imageBlock-1(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[0].src + ')'}") 
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
                div.imageBlock-2(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[1].src + ')'}")
                    div.imageMask 文章種類 
            div 
                div.imageBlock-3(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[2].src + ')'}")
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
                div.imageBlock-4(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[0].src + ')'}")
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
        div.contentBlock-2.contentBlock
            div.blockTitle 最新消息 
                div.newsDer
            table
                tr(v-for='item in newList')
                    td.newsList
                        div.newsImage
                            img(:src='item.src')
                    td.newsTitle {{item.title}}
    div.content
        div.contentBlock-3.contentBlock
            div.onlyImageBlock(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + midArticle.src + ')'}")
                div.onlyImageMask 文章種類
        div.contentBlock-4.contentBlock
            div
                div.imageBlock-1(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[0].src + ')'}") 
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
                div.imageBlock-2(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[1].src + ')'}")
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
            div    
                div.imageBlock-3(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[2].src + ')'}")
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
                div.imageBlock-4(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[0].src + ')'}")
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
</template>

<script>
import SlideShow from './SlideShow.vue'
export default {
    components: {
        SlideShow
    },
    data() {
        return {
            jumpBar: [
            {
                src: 'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1bGzE1WKQB8GaCK5SwNyM8bkWkihsh4cB',
                title: '1title',
                subtitle: '1subTitle'
            },
            {
                src: 'https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/carousel/sky.jpg',
                title: 'hhahahah',
                subtitle: 'lalalalala'
            },
            {
                src: 'https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/carousel/bird.jpg',
                title: 'title',
                subtitle: 'subtitle'
            },
            {
                src: 'https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/carousel/planet.jpg',
                title: 'title',
                subtitle: 'subtitle'
            },
            ],
            
            newList: [
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=18oEw9LHOZ6xAYpOgOkAAS1aErsqxfQnj',title: '2019台積電文學獎徵選'},
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1aZCAvTGfMlegjuPWWYt-2H__43G_5C6X',title: '文化部鼓勵企業參與，第１４屆...'},
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1KvyU-9wizbgXLpVs6vTR0bi5qTJZZd3D',title: '2019台積電文學獎徵選'},
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1U1tibryBcLQkXoHOFJ0Gs31NdeSczDXV',title: '2019台積電文學獎徵選'}
            ],
            article: [
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1LSmUrWFmmNic38VQqSnSGiHmteQunLhJ',title:''},
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1iqWr031nFEhn-EDbHuFdR4G_MngFZydc',title:''},
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1njXHmK050y_qdLeodSRnfio6fwx8dToY',title:''}
            ],
            midArticle: {
                src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1JVmSvd3KY2g73kITkHUf2dE-6A81e8hR',
                title: ''
            }
        }
    },
    methods: {
        
    }
}

</script>
